name: Death By Sleep Demo
description:
This is Death By Sleep Demo made from RPG Marker MV. This is a game based off the creepy pasta  Jeff The Killer. This game will be updated regularly even thought it's just a demo. If you have any problems or suggestion please leave a comment and I'll try to answer the soonest i can. You can beat the demo in two minutes if you were wondering how long it is.

Issues:

1. My grammar needs fixing.
